name: constrict
content:
constrict verb
(BECOME TIGHTER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I or T ] to become tighter and narrower, or to make something become tighter and narrower: He hated wearing a tie - he felt it constricted his breathing. When you're dancing, you don't want to wear anything that constricts your movements. The drug causes the blood vessels to constrict.
